## DatetimePickerDirective class

Directive that is used for creating date/datetimepicker

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DatetimePickerDirective implements OnInit, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(\_element, type, globalizationService, platformId)](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DatetimePickerDirective</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [dateChange](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective.datechange.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;moment.Moment&gt;</code> | Output event that is triggered when value of picker has changed |
|  [linkWith](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective.linkwith.md) |  | <code>DatetimePickerDirective</code> | Object of other datetime picker which will be linked with this, set only on second one (containing higher value) |
|  [locale](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective.locale.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Moment js locale that will set format of date time |
|  [pickerChanged](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective.pickerchanged.md) |  | <code>Observable&lt;moment.Moment&gt;</code> | Gets observable that is trigerred when picker value changed |
|  [value](./bootstrap-datetimepicker.datetimepickerdirective.value.md) |  | <code>any</code> | Gets or sets value of datetime picker, any picker supported value |
